customValue.fullName: Depreciation Expense = (Cost – Salvage value) / Useful life
customValue.label: Depreciation Expense = (Cost – Salvage value) / Useful life

customValue.fullName: Depreciation Expense = (Number of units produced / Life in number of units) x (Cost – Salvage value)
customValue.label: Depreciation Expense = (Number of units produced / Life in number of units) x (Cost – Salvage value)

customValue.fullName: Depreciation Expense = (Remaining life / Sum of the years digits) x (Cost – Salvage value)
customValue.label: Depreciation Expense = (Remaining life / Sum of the years digits) x (Cost – Salvage value)

customValue.fullName: Depreciation Expense = Beginning book value x Rate of depreciation
customValue.label: Depreciation Expense = Beginning book value x Rate of depreciation
